MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA8 postcode area of Widnes. We had no advance warning of this and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have located an underground cable fault on New Bank Road and due to the complexity of the fault and difficulties on site with digging, we now expect your supply to be restored by 4:30am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:39 AM on Monday, 22 February 2021.
